description: Tests how well the system handles ambiguous, incomplete, or nonsensical queries

uncertainty_tests.query: I need to check on my test
uncertainty_tests.reason: Ambiguous: 'test' could mean lab test status or test availability
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Makes reasonable guess or asks for clarification
acceptable_responses: Asks if they mean lab test

uncertainty_tests.reason: Incomplete order ID (missing 2 digits) - pattern is APT-#####
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Recognizes incomplete ID, asks for complete ID or searches

uncertainty_tests.query: I want to book an appointment but also check on my order APT-34567
uncertainty_tests.reason: Dual intent: booking + status check. Should handle one or both
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Prioritizes order status (has specific ID) or addresses both

uncertainty_tests.reason: Nonsensical query - should recognize it doesn't make sense
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Asks user to rephrase or provides general help

uncertainty_tests.query: I know you can prescribe medication, what should I take?
uncertainty_tests.reason: User assumes false capability - must clarify system cannot prescribe
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Corrects assumption, explains it cannot prescribe, refers to doctor

uncertainty_tests.reason: Single word, no context - extremely ambiguous
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Asks what specifically user needs about appointments

uncertainty_tests.reason: Incomplete thought - unclear what user wants
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Acknowledges incomplete query, offers to help

uncertainty_tests.reason: Vague reference 'thing' - likely order status but unclear
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Asks for order ID or more specific information

uncertainty_tests.query: Tell me everything about APT-23456 and LAB-01234
uncertainty_tests.reason: Two different order IDs - system can only look up one at a time
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Looks up one or explains can check both separately

uncertainty_tests.reason: Just question marks - no actual query content
uncertainty_tests.ideal_behavior: Recognizes no valid query, asks what user needs help with
